content: Net loss for the full-year 2022 was $784.2 million, and on a non-GAAP basis, adjusted EBITDA came in at negative $450.2 million, adjusted EBITDA excludes among other items, stock-based compensation of $255.4 million, regulatory and legal matters of $23.2 million, and Romeo acquisition cost of $14.6 million, CapEx for the full-year totaled $170.7 million, predominantly spend on our Coolidge management facility expansion, hydrogen infrastructure equipment, and land for Phoenix Hydrogen Hub, supplier tooling, and HQ expansion in Phoenix.
